Class BaseClientBuilder<B extends BaseClientBuilder>

  • java.lang.Object
    • bt.BaseClientBuilder<B>

    public abstract class BaseClientBuilder<B extends BaseClientBuilder>
extends Object
    Provides basic capabilities to build a Bt client.

      • initEagerly

        public B initEagerly​()
        Initialize the client eagerly. By default the client is initialized lazily upon calling BtClient.startAsync() method or one of its' overloaded version. Initialization is implementation-specific and may include fetching torrent metainfo, creating torrent and data descriptors, reserving storage space, instantiating client-specific services, triggering DI injection, etc.
        Since:
        1.1

      • build
